detail_desc: Long, finely-pleated dress in softly draping jersey. Round neckline with narrow, covered elastication and an open back with adjustable lacing. Seam at the waist with narrow, covered elastication and small, decorative frills. Gently flared skirt with a high slit in one side. Unlined.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Playsuit in soft, patterned viscose with a V-neck, lacing at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounced sleeves, an elasticated, gathered seam at the waist and frill-trimmed hems.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Make-up bag in transparent, patterned plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 8.5x10x18 cm.
Yoga top in fast-drying jersey with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Cut out section and a mesh panel at the back.
Sleeveless, ribbed jersey jumpsuit in a straight cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and wide, 3/4-length legs. Lined at the top.
Ankle boots in imitation suede. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Hair clips in metal and plastic. Width 0.5 cm, length 6 cm.
Mules with pointed toes, satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Bikini top with a wrapover front, side support, ties at the back of the neck and wide ties at the back. Lined.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, detachable shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener, and two inner compartments. Lined. Size 15x20 cm.
Short-sleeved top in a rib knit with a ribbed trim around the neckline. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.

department_name: Underwear Jersey Fancy inactive from s1
detail_desc: Boxer shorts in a pima cotton weave with an elasticated waist and concealed button fly.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Backpack in woven fabric with imitation leather details and a handle and drawstring at the top. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, one outer compartment and a flap with decorative metal buckles and concealed magnetic fasteners. Lined. Size 11x27x37 cm.
Sandals with crossover straps in imitation leather with a large decorative metal buckle, moulded insoles and fluted soles. Platform approx. 3.5 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides.
Brazilian briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with an all-over print. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Trousers in soft, patterned jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short cargo shorts in patterned cotton twill with side pockets, welt back pockets with a flap, flap leg pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front and two slits at the front.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable mesh with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short dress in organic cotton jersey. Opening with ties at the top, short cap sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Jersey headband with a soft fleece inside.
Sandals with adjustable hook and loop tabs at the top, a loop at the back and patterned soles.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Fitted, long-sleeved dress in a fine knit with a semi-transparent section at the top and a ribbed neckline.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Metal Alice band with a decorative chain detail on top. Width 1.7 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour trim. High waist with covered elastication and rounded hems.
Short, fitted lace dress with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and a concealed zip in the side. Lined.

Small bucket bag woven in a cotton blend and covered with plastic beads. Handle made from large plastic beads, a detachable metal chain shoulder strap, drawstring at the top and one inner compartment. Diameter 12 cm. Height 14 cm.

Dress in a patterned modal weave with a round neckline with gathers at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a decorative bow. Unlined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Waist bag with a sheen. Large, zipped compartment at the front and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Size approx. 5x13x27 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a lace layer at the top and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, wide 3/4-length sleeves with raw, scalloped edges, and side pockets. Seam at the waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back. Partly lined.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave containing some wool with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and a fastening with two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Pull-on trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Sports trousers in fabric with a slight sheen. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the back and shoulder straps with scalloped edges and broderie anglaise that meet at the back. Unlined.
Captain’s cap in woven fabric with knots at the sides and braiding at the front. Lined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in an airy patterned weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie and flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the top. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Platform ankle boots with a zip in one side and covered heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber soles. Platform front 1.4 cm, heel 12 cm.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and wide tie belt. Sewn-in wrapover at the front with draping. Unlined.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.

Short dress in patterned chiffon with frill trims and a V-neck with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Sewn-in wrapover at the front, an elasticated seam at the waist, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and medium coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a gently rounded hem. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Calf-length dress in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wrapover at the bust for a gentle draped effect. Gentle flare at the hem. Unlined.
Flared, calf-length skirt in imitation leather. High waist with press-studs and a concealed zip at one side, and visible seams front and back. Unlined.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and adjustable braces with a concealed fastening at the front.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Metal hoop earrings, one pair of which is in a twisted style. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems.
Waist bag in nylon with a zip at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Depth 7 cm. Height 10.5 cm. Width 20 cm.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with hole-knit details. Round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the front for best fit over the tummy. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with buttons at the top and short sleeves.

Blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck at the front and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short trumpet sleeves, a decorative drawstring down the front with a sewn-in bow, and a flounce at the hem.

Pile-lined jacket in denim with worn details. Drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets. Buttoned cuffs and a tab and button at the sides.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed cuffs and hems.
Short thin metal chain necklace decorated with shimmering plastic beads. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
